eolUint  id

confirms that the resource pointed at by element is the one expected based on the id.

Parameters:
manager the resource manager for which this element is a member
element the element in question

Returns:

void eol_resource_free_element ( eolResourceManager *  manager,
void **  data 
)

reduces the reference count to the element passed in. if data in the manager is unique. it will invoke delete on it.

Parameters:
manager the resource manager where the element belongs
data a pointer to the element pointer. The element pointer will be set to NULL upon completion.

void *  data 
)

iterates through the resource list

Parameters:
manager the resource manager to iterate through
data the position to iterate from. If passed NULL, it will iterate through the list from the beginning.
Returns:
a pointer to the next element in the resource manager or NULL if there are no more elements.
